item.title: Docker Getting Started
item.description: img { width: 100%; height: auto; } Docker A docker container is a packaged application with all necessary dependencies and configuration included to move, share and run an application. The video version of this: Road to Kubernetes - 01- docker basics & getting started - k3s / k8s Why use it ? Docker compared to virtual machines do not have their own kernel running but use the kernel from the host system.
